title: One Watch Face
summary: Syzygy One - Simple, Smart, Unobtrusive, Glanceable, Ever-ready Watch Face.
description: ★ Syzygy Watches ★! All Watch Face Photos Made Without Photoshop.! Watch Face compatible with Android Wear Device (Moto 360, LG G Watch R, SmartWatch 3, etc.)! Works for round and squared watches.! We DO NOT support SAMSUNG GEAR, GEAR 2 or GEAR S - Those are not Android Wear Watches.Indicators:✔ Weather ✔ Watch battery indicator✔ Phone battery indicatorIcons for widgets made by Freepik  http://www.freepik.com  from  http://www.flaticon.com is licensed by Creative Commons BY 3.0 Configuration:✔ Customizable ambient mode✔ Choose indicators✔ Choose color all elements✔ Choose weather unit✔ And much moreHow to use:✔ After install long press your android wear watch and choose Syzygy One as you watch face✔ Enjoy your new watchface!More Syzygy watch faces:✔ Visit our exclusive collection on the Play Store - https://goo.gl/n1OQdy  Feedback:✔ Send us feedback in any language at syzygywatches@gmail.com★ Thanks for your support! ★
descriptionHTML:
★ Syzygy Watches ★

! All Watch Face Photos Made Without Photoshop.
! Watch Face compatible with Android Wear Device (Moto 360, LG G Watch R, SmartWatch 3, etc.)
! Works for round and squared watches.
! We DO NOT support SAMSUNG GEAR, GEAR 2 or GEAR S - Those are not Android Wear Watches.

Indicators:
✔ Weather
✔ Watch battery indicator
✔ Phone battery indicator

Icons for widgets made by Freepik http://www.freepik.com from http://www.flaticon.com is licensed by Creative Commons BY 3.0


Configuration:
✔ Customizable ambient mode
✔ Choose indicators
✔ Choose color all elements
✔ Choose weather unit
✔ And much more

How to use:
✔ After install long press your android wear watch and choose Syzygy One as you watch face
✔ Enjoy your new watchface!

More Syzygy watch faces:
✔ Visit our exclusive collection on the Play Store - https://goo.gl/n1OQdy


Feedback:
✔ Send us feedback in any language at syzygywatches@gmail.com

★ Thanks for your support! ★
